documentation.text:
Constructor: initiates the value feed smart contract
 @param _value The value token

@notice Withdraws all tokens owned by a user from their respective value pools
 @param _user The ETH address of the specified user

Constructor: initiates the value feed smart contract
 @param _value The value token

@notice Withdraws all tokens owned by a user from their respective value pools
 @param _user The ETH address of the specified user

devdoc.author: Nobody (that's me!)
devdoc.details: Ownable so that later on it can be sent to a governance smart contract. (This will only be done once VALUE has enough holders, so much so that an ecosystem has been created (>1000 users)

addToken(address).details: Owner only to prevent any DoS attacks

params._tokenAddress: The address of the value pool's token's contract

params._user: ETH address of the specified user

returns._0: The total reward in VALUE owed to the user

params._amount: The specified amount of tokens being deposited
params._tokenAddress: The address of the value pool's token's contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._user: ETH address of the specified user

returns._0: The cumulative reward rate of the user

params._user: The ETH address of the specified user

params._amount: The amount of tokens being withdrawn
params._tokenAddress: The address of the token contract who's value pool

devdoc.title: A contract for the Value Feed

addToken(address).notice: Adds a token address for which a value pool was created

calculateReward(address).notice: Calculates the (total) reward for a given user address

constructor.notice: Constructor: initiates the value feed smart contract

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposits a given amount to a value pool

viewRate(address).notice: Retrieves the quadri-weekly reward rate of a given user

withdrawAllOwned(address).notice: Withdraws all tokens owned by a user from their respective value pools

withdrawFromPool(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws a given amount from a value pool

userdoc.notice: The value feed is the emergent body made up of all value pools, and all the assets stored in them as well as their holders themselves.
